distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for u-boot fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-34835: Fixed stack buffer overflow vulnerability in i2c md command (bsc#1201214).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In Das U-Boot through 2022.07-rc5, an integer signedness error and resultant stack-based buffer overflow in the "i2c md" command enables the corruption of the return address pointer of the do_i2c_md function.
notes.title: CVE description
